title: EMPEROR LARGE (B type) Three bedroom apartment for immediate SALE.
details:
Luxury Three Bedroom Apartment For Immediate SALE at The Emperor.

Three Bedroom with an en-suite toilet and a common toilet, Large Living & Dining Area, Pantry Kitchen, Facing Beira Lake & Sea View.

Partial Sea View from the Master Bedroom and a 90 degree balcony with a built in Jacuzzi.

This is a fully Furnished apartment.

Maids Room & Toilet.

Same compound as Cinnamon Grand (5 star hotel with multiple restaurant, Ansana spa + Gym)

Keels super market � Crescat Shopping Mall

Laundry + shopping facility � Crescat shopping mall

24 hours security

Designated parking

Web Site: www.menavid.lk
